document.full_text: dwyane wade and the miami heat were able to hold on to a late lead and beat the mavericks to take a 2-1 series lead.
document.title: heat 88, mavericks 86: wade, james lift heat to 2-1 lead in n.b.a. finals
lines_and_colors: dwyane wade and the miami heat were able to hold on to a late lead and beat the mavericks to take a 2-1 series lead.
